biome.enabled.description: Whether to enable the Biome extension

oneOf.description: Path to the Biome Language Server binary
Platform-specific paths to the Biome Language Server binary

biome.requireConfigFile.markdownDescription: Require a Biome configuration file to be present at the root of a Biome project to start an LSP session for that project.

biome.rename.markdownDescription: Enable/Disable Biome handling renames in the workspace. (Experimental)
biome.rename.deprecationMessage: This setting has been deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the extension. Please use the `biome.experimental.rename` setting instead.

biome.searchInPath.markdownDescription: Whether to search for the biome executable in the folders declared in the PATH environment variable
biome.searchInPath.deprecationMessage: This setting has been deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the extension. The extension will now always search for the biome executable in the PATH environment variable.

biome.lspBin.deprecationMessage: This setting has been deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the extension. Please use the `biome.lsp.bin` setting instead.
biome.lspBin.description: The biome lsp server executable. If the path is relative, the workspace folder will be used as base path

biome_lsp.trace.server.deprecationMessage: This setting has been deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the extension. Please use the `biome.lsp.trace.server` setting instead.
biome_lsp.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

biome.lsp.trace.server.description: Tracing level of the communications between the extension and the Biome Language Server.

anyOf.description: List of projects in which an independent Biome Language Server should be started in a multi-root workspace.

path.description: Path (relative to the workspace folder) to the root of the project in which an independent Biome Language Server should be started. The root of the workspace folder is used if left unspecified.

folder.description: Name of the workspace folder in which the project is located.

configFile.description: Path (relative to the workspace folder) to the Biome configuration file. Biome will use the default biome.json(c) or fallback to defaults if left unspecified.

anyOf.description: List of projects in which an independent Biome Language Server should be started in a single-root workspace.

path.description: Path to the root of the project in which an independent Biome Language Server should be started.

configFile.description: Path to the Biome configuration file. Biome will use the default biome.json(c) or fallback to defaults if left unspecified.

biome.experimental.rename.markdownDescription: Use Biome to handle symbols renames in the workspace. (Experimental)
